text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Current time—five p.m. Quota has<n>been successfully met.
Now engaging<n>in a brief moment of respite before<n>initiating
the next phase of training.

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text: U-um, excuse me, are you Mihono<n>Bourbon?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: An Umamusume jogs over to where<n>Bourbon is resting.

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Hey, I hope I'm not interrupting<n>anything! I just think it's
really<n>awesome how hard you're working<n>every day!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No need to be concerned. It appears<n>that you wish to have a
discussion.<n>How can I help you?

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Uh, well... I heard you used to only run<n>sprints, right? It's so
cool that you're<n>able to run medium-distance now!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Mihono Bourbon stares curiously at<n>the excited student.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: If I may ask, what is the purpose of<n>this conversation?

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
You engaged me in conversation<n>during my break.
Statistically, this<n>action suggests an underlying motive.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Common motivations include queries,<n>transmission of
information, and<n>fact-checking. Which of the above<n>best
suits your purpose?

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text: P-purpose?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As the Umamusume struggles to find<n>an answer, her face
begins to turn<n>pink.

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I just wanted to talk to you... I'm<n>sorry for taking up your
time! I'll get<n>going now!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Wait, there's been a<n>misunderstanding...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Perplexed, Mihono Bourbon watches<n>the embarrassed
trainee speed away.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
My conversation ended unexpectedly<n>due to insufficiently
defined "motive"<n>parameter. Analyzing crash log for<n>
source of error.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I have been updating my database<n>with facial expressions
and vocal<n>inflection samples, but I am<n>experiencing
difficulty implementing<n>them in conversations.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Feeling bemused, I take a moment to<n>think. Is this her
unique way of trying<n>to get better at talking to people?
choice_data_list: Can I ask you why you're doing this?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Certainly. I was prompted by my<n>parents to improve my
"sociability"<n>functions.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
The majority of my formative years<n>were spent training
from sunrise to<n>sunset with my father. Consequently,<n>I
seldom had opportunities to interact<n>with my peers.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Once my acceptance to Tracen<n>Academy was confirmed, my
parents<n>began to demonstrate great concern<n>over my
limited interpersonal<n>experiences.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
On multiple occasions, they told me to,<n>and I quote, "prioritize
engaging with<n>my friends and classmates."

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
It is true that communicative abilities<n>are essential for
interviews and fan<n>engagement. As an Umamusume,<n>
enhancing my "sociability" is simply<n>unavoidable.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I defined a set of parameters related<n>to "sociability," and
have endeavored<n>to refine them by engaging in<n>
conversation.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
However, the statistics have shown<n>limited improvement
relative to that of<n>my physical parameters.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
A study showed that questions are<n>effective starters, but
they only<n>caused my conversational partner to<n>flee. At this
rate, failure is certain.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can tell her intentions are good, but<n>her methods leave
much to be<n>desired.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Are her parents this robotic too? I get<n>the feeling Bourbon is
interpreting their<n>instructions in an over-rational way.
choice_data_list: I think what your parents wanted to say was...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I explain that her parents probably<n>just want her to enjoy
spending time<n>with friends. In response, her<n>expression
becomes more puzzled.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
My apologies, but I am having trouble<n>comprehending. I
have no data<n>pertaining to "spending time with<n>friends."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Reframing my explanation, I begin<n>talking about the benefits
of having<n>friends, but am cut short.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
My resting period concluded twenty<n>seconds ago. I must
now return to my<n>training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Without a second to spare, she takes<n>off down the track.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon's racing abilities are<n>no doubt impressive,
but her lack of<n>connection with the world beyond the<n>race
track concerns me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I watch her figure dart across the<n>field, I pray that one
day she'll<n>understand the meaning behind her<n>parents'
words.
